targets.query: SELECT last("DurationSinceLastBackup") FROM "LastBackup" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "BackupName"
SELECT sum(last) FROM (SELECT last("Examined") FROM "bytes" GROUP BY "BackupName")
SELECT sum(last) FROM (SELECT last("Known") FROM "bytes" GROUP BY "BackupName")
